scripts.cf:prepare: rm -rf .cf-dist && mkdir -p .cf-dist && cp index.html styles.css sw.js .cf-dist/ && cp -R src .cf-dist/
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run cf:prepare && NPM_CONFIG_CACHE=./.npm-cache npx --yes wrangler pages deploy .cf-dist --project-name grind-n-chill-web --branch main --commit-dirty=true
